document.paragraph:

2Compiling
To see compiling instructions, you have to enable javascript.
2Running After launching the application, you will see a window displayed with a similar appearance to the one above. When the window has the focus, the key combination Ctrl + Q will exit the application.
2Under the Hood An EV_ACCELERATOR is created and associated with the EV_TITLED_WINDOW used for the main window of the application. The association is made by adding the accelerator to the accelerators list of the window. This sample contains the following class:
ACCELERATOR
